name: Water
description: Water is a basic resource needed for survival on Icarus. It may be consumed by drinking from natural water sources such as lakes, streams, and pools found in Caves . Water from these natural sources is Tainted Water and has a 15% chance of causing dysentery. Water has various levels of purity depending on source and means of filtering. A status icon is displayed to indicate the type and status of water the prospector has consumed.
